"The ARKS rules and regulations have thi: "\"For those who cannot even defeat a Fangulf, a Mag License is unwarranted.\""
"Mags are very useful to ARKS. Everybody wants to have one, but their convenience has caused trouble when they are misused."
"For this reason, a Mag cannot be used unless you possess a Mag License."
"There are some who say that Mags are unnecessary. However, given my position and my perspective, I would encourage you to obtain a license."

"Mags provide support in a variety of ways, such as parameter boosting, battle support, Photon Blasts, item creation etc.

As your Mag grows, your character's power also grows."

"Your equipped Mag's parameters are added to your character's parameters, allowing you to strengthen your character.

Your Mag has \"energy\", which decreases over time and when it performs support actions."
